Senior Information Systems Developer



  [Dev-2003-04-08-102]
Senior Information Systems Developer
- Toronto, Ontario
Posted on: 2003-04-08

Position reports to Corporate Manager, Database & Information Systems
Salary range: Commensurate with experience

Main purpose
To be responsible for analysis, design, hands on development and maintenance of all existing and new Information Systems applications while working with a team of Developers and DBAs.

Key responsibilities
1.Design, develop and maintain Tucows internally developed ERP and CRM Information Systems applications and data sources.
2.Work cross functionally with various departments to understand there needs and deliver Information services.
3.Actively participate in the analysis and hands on development of all major/minor Information Systems projects.
4.Work with a small team of Analysts, Developers and DBAs as a senior team member.
5.Mentor junior staff with development projects.

Ideal Candidate Profile
Related experience / Unique skill set
1.Around 5 to 7 years of practical experience in Information Systems Analysis and development.
2.Expert level hands on experience in designing and developing analytic reporting including Financial and Distribution systems.
3.Excellent development experience in web development using Perl, PHP, HTML, Java Script running under APACHE.
4.Proven expert background in Oracle development tools such as SQL *Plus, PL/SQL, and SQL *Loader.
5.Strong concepts about data warehousing and practical experience working with Microsoft OLAP tools and MS SQL Server.
6.Excellent working knowledge about RDBMS systems and Oracle8i in particular.
7.Excellent practical experience using Linux, Solaris or other Unix flavors.
8.Version control system experience (preferably CVS).
9.Experience in mentoring small teams of analysts and developers.
10.Experience in working with multiple teams in a cross-functional setup.
11.Experience in object oriented programming languages such as Java and C++ is a plus.
12.Willing to work long and sometime odd hours whenever needed

Education

Bachelor Degree in Information Science/Computer Science or equivalent experience.

Interpersonal skills
1.Self motivated with tons of creative as well as productive energy.
2.Excellent time management skills to meet demanding timelines.
3.Excellent planning and documentation skills.
4.Ability to effectively communicate with users of all type and technical levels.
5.Strong sense of ownership and urgency to deliver services in a timely fashion.
6.Ability to comprehend Company's broader business objectives.
7.Ability to understand and manage dynamically shifting priorities.
8.Natural ability to work under pressure.
9.Good conflict management and resolution skills.

Supervisory experience
N/A

Other
1.Expect to work long and sometimes odd hours whenever needed.
2.Expect to be on call 24/7 as a part of high availability support cycle.

Please e-mail your resume and cover letter to hrdept@tucows.com and refer to
[Dev-2003-04-08-102] Senior Information Systems Developer in the subject line.


If you are applying for any other opportunitites with Tucows, please submit your resume to hrdept@tucows.com


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
